binding:binding.name: Homie Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for Homie devices, using the Homie MQTT convention.
binding:binding.author: Michael Kolb

parameter.name: mqttbrokerurl
parameter.label: MQTT Broker URL
parameter.description: MQTT Broker URL in the format "tcp://myBrokerHost:1883"

parameter.name: basetopic
parameter.label: MQTT base topic
parameter.description: topic under which all your devices are located. If e.g. your device sends to homie/mydevice-1/$online, your basetopic is "homie/"
